TopicTitle: RO/RP1 - Maneuver node not showing burn info

Articles.Content:
Hello,

im fairly new to RP1, but I have orbited the moon (1964) in this attempt. I recently got maneuver nodes and I’m guessing because of the new engines, I don’t have the burn time or “start burn in xx “ information. Any idea why? And is there a way for me to get it back? I’m watching Justin Bright play through and he has it working just fine…
I have the same problem as you

Just FYI, the stock delta-V system was completely disabled in a recent version of RO since it doesn't work well for most of the propellant combinations used by RO. Next Small Step is a great series and one of the main reasons why I started playing RO/RP-1 after initially trying and hating it some time before, but it's a couple of years old now and uses outdated versions of most of the key mods as well as much older versions of KSP.

This is the RP-1 Discord, you can ask them:

https://discordapp.com/invite/ZGbR6nv
